name: Project Yokai
description:
Project Yokai (Name pending) is a third person action adventure platforming game about the spirit realm.  In this stylized cartoony limbo world find grim enemies to fight, hidden collectibles to tell a story and uncover secrets!

We are a student group project that will have a demo planned for release at the end of the year. Planned builds are planned for every 3 weeks or so. Provide your feedback to help us make this the greatest game we can!
